nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Anakin to the Rescue
LEGO Star Wars: Anakin to the Rescue is a children's book written by Ace Landers and released on August 21, 2012. It is a follow-up to the fall 2011 book, LEGO Star Wars: Darth Maul's Mission.

Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi are assigned to protect Senator Amidala, who is in danger of attack from the likes of bounty hunter Jango Fett. After several action-packed and fun-filled moments, the tale wraps up with a small army of Jedi, including Yoda and Mace Windu, facing off against Jango Fett and an army of droids.
